siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Find commonalities and ask questions
frontmatter.description: Ask questions. Be interested in the commonalities.

frontmatter.title: Socializing sparks spontaneity
frontmatter.description: Make time to socialize to spark new ideas.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology for positive effects
frontmatter.description: New technology poses problems and creates opportunities. Find the ways to harness the best and filter out the bad.

frontmatter.title: Building an audience is vital to project success
frontmatter.description: It's not wrong to build an audience - in the physical or digital worlds. It can be looked at as vain and done in the wrong way.

frontmatter.title: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions
frontmatter.description: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions

frontmatter.title: Open conversations based on existing efforts
frontmatter.description: Open conversations to strengthen relationships and get more out of existing investments of time. Share projects, thoughts, ideas with existing networks in the right manner.

frontmatter.title: Digital communications enhance existing efforts
frontmatter.description: Digital communications should enhance existing efforts. Share projects, thoughts, ideas with existing networks in the right manner.
